p: T. copticum, P. nigrum, A.calamus, E. Cardamomum, M. piperita and C. aromaticus were collected and dried carefully. Extract of these plants material was prepared by methanol and extract was dried to eliminate solvent. 3% T. copticum, 5% P. nigrum, 15 A.calamus, 2% E. Cardamomum, 5% M. piperita and 3% C. aromaticus extracts were mixed/added together. 15% of Aloe barbadensis, 10% almond aqueous and 30% of menthol was added in above prepared mixture, where finally citric acid was used as preservative and make the final volume up to 100Â ml by using distilled water ( Kalaivani et al., 2018).
